attributes.action: that james blunt(and others like)  be stopped releasing albums, singles or music in general
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
this man has assaulted my ears for a few years now, and i along with several others are sick of it.

he has spawned a whole generation of others who are similarly assualting my ears with thier semi-acoustic drivel

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
